info.title: Ethos API
info.description: Access Ethos data including profiles, vouches, attestations, scores, and more via RESTful endpoints

Exchange Privy session for Ethos JWTs
post.description: Verifies the Privy bearer token and sets Ethos access/refresh JWTs via HttpOnly cookies.

post.summary: Logout and clear Ethos JWT cookies
post.description: Clears Ethos access/refresh cookies and revokes the current refresh token if present. If deviceIdentifier is provided, also removes the FCM push notification token for that device. Safe to call even if not authenticated.

get.summary: List all applications with pagination and filtering
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of applications built on Ethos. Supports filtering by app type (APP, INTEGRATION, AGENT) and status (ACTIVE, INACTIVE).

post.summary: Create a new app

get.summary: Get a specific app by ID
Get apps by type
Get currently active auction
Get auction details by ID
List auctions with optional filters and sorting
List limited-time benefits with pagination and filtering
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of limited-time benefits. Supports filtering by status and sorting.

get.summary: List score-based benefits with pagination and filtering
get.description:
Retrieve a paginated list of score-based benefits. By default, returns all benefits. Optionally filter by status, multiple category IDs, and user score.

 **IMPORTANT**: Due to OpenAPI UI limitations, the `categoryIds` parameter requires at least 2 items to work correctly. Single category selection will result in a validation error.

get.summary: List all benefits (admin only)
Get all categories

post.summary: Create a new category
Create a new benefit

get.summary: List broker posts with filtering and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of broker posts. Supports filtering by type (SELL, BUY, HIRE, FOR_HIRE), status, tags, author minimum score, and search functionality for title/description. Results can be sorted by newest, score, top (most votes), or expiresAt (expiring soon). When level is not specified (ALL), minScore acts as "author score >= minScore OR premium level". For BASIC or PREMIUM level, minScore applies normally.

get.summary: Get current user's broker posts
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of broker posts created by the current authenticated user. Supports filtering by type and status.

get.summary: Get a specific broker post by ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific broker post including author information.

get.summary: Get broker post by transaction hash
get.description: Retrieve a broker post by the transaction hash that created or updated it. This endpoint will spot-process the transaction if needed to ensure the latest data is available.

put.summary: Update broker post status/archive fields (author only)
put.description: Update off-chain fields like status, archived, and image URL that are not stored on blockchain. When changing status from EXPIRED to OPEN for BASIC posts, automatically resets expiration date to 30 days from now.

get.summary: Get posts by specific author
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of broker posts created by a specific author. Supports filtering by type and status. Only shows non-archived posts.

post.summary: Report a broker post for inappropriate content
post.description: Report a broker post for spam, inappropriate content, fraud, harassment, or other issues. Requires authentication.

post.summary: Preview AI image for broker post
post.description: Generates a preview image for a broker post using the provided content and author profile. Returns the image directly without creating a job.

get.summary: Get the current user's vote balance, optionally for a specific listings project and season
Get paginated list of project voters with their vote statistics and totals
get.description:
**Time Scope Options (scope parameter):**
- `scope=global`: All-time data from first vote to present
- `scope=global-dates`: Custom date range (requires startDate & endDate)
- `scope=current-period`: Current voting period (default - backend determines automatically)
- `scope=period`: Specific voting period (requires year & period)

**Parameter Requirements by Scope:**
- `global`: No additional parameters needed
- `global-dates`: Requires `startDate` and `endDate` (ISO date strings)
- `current-period`: No additional parameters needed (default)
- `period`: Requires `year` (number) and `period` (number)


**Examples:**
- All-time: `GET /projects/123/voters?scope=global`
- Date range: `GET /projects/123/voters?scope=global-dates&startDate=2024-01-01&endDate=2024-12-31`
- Current period: `GET /projects/123/voters` (default) or `GET /projects/123/voters?scope=current-period`
- Specific period: `GET /projects/123/voters?scope=period&year=2024&period=3`

**Notes:**
- End dates extending into the future are automatically capped to the current time
- Global scope uses all historical data for the project

post.summary: Reallocate votes for all users (Admin only)
post.description:
**Operation Types:**
- `reset` (default): Resets the voting period by advancing to the next period and allocating fresh votes
- `reallocate`: Allocates additional votes for the current period without advancing the period

get.summary: Get bulk user project vote totals with flexible time range support
get.description:
**Time Scope Options (scope parameter):**
- `scope=global`: All-time data from first vote to present
- `scope=global-dates`: Custom date range (requires startDate & endDate)
- `scope=current-period`: Current voting period (default - backend determines automatically)
- `scope=period`: Specific voting period (requires year & period)

**Parameter Requirements by Scope:**
- `global`: No additional parameters needed
- `global-dates`: Requires `startDate` and `endDate` (ISO date strings)
- `current-period`: No additional parameters needed (default)
- `period`: Requires `year` (number) and `period` (number)


**Examples:**
- All-time: `GET /projects/PROJECT_ID/bulk-totals?scope=global`
- Date range: `GET /projects/PROJECT_ID/bulk-totals?scope=global-dates&startDate=2024-01-01&endDate=2024-12-31`
- Current period: `GET /projects/PROJECT_ID/bulk-totals` (default) or `GET /projects/PROJECT_ID/bulk-totals?scope=current-period`
- Specific period: `GET /projects/PROJECT_ID/bulk-totals?scope=period&year=2024&period=3`

**Notes:**
- End dates extending into the future are automatically capped to the current time
- Global scope uses all historical data for the project

get.summary: Get project vote chart data with flexible time range and aggregation options
get.description:
**Time Scope Options (scope parameter):**
- `scope=global`: All-time data from first vote to present
- `scope=global-dates`: Custom date range (requires startDate & endDate)
- `scope=current-period`: Current voting period (default - backend determines automatically)
- `scope=period`: Specific voting period (requires year & period)

**Parameter Requirements by Scope:**
- `global`: No additional parameters needed
- `global-dates`: Requires `startDate` and `endDate` (ISO date strings)
- `current-period`: No additional parameters needed (default)
- `period`: Requires `year` (number) and `period` (number)

**Time Aggregation (bucket parameter):**
- Available buckets: '1 minute', '5 minutes', '15 minutes', '30 minutes', '1 hour', '2 hours', '6 hours', '12 hours', '1 day', '1 week', '1 month'
- If bucket is omitted, the API auto-selects an optimal bucket size based on the time range to prevent excessive data points
- For large time spans with small buckets, an error will be returned with a suggested larger bucket
- Maximum data points: 2000 (for performance)

**Examples:**
- All-time: `GET /projects/123/chart?scope=global`
- Date range: `GET /projects/123/chart?scope=global-dates&startDate=2024-01-01&endDate=2024-12-31`
- Current period: `GET /projects/123/chart` (default) or `GET /projects/123/chart?scope=current-period`
- Specific period: `GET /projects/123/chart?scope=period&year=2024&period=3`

**Notes:**
- End dates extending into the future are automatically capped to the current time
- Global scope uses all historical data for the project

Get multiple users by Farcaster user IDs
Get multiple users by Farcaster usernames
post.description:
Bulk lookup of users by Farcaster usernames. Results are categorized into three arrays:

   "users": Successfully matched usernames with their Ethos user data

   "notFoundUsernames": Valid usernames with no associated Ethos users

   "errorUsernames": Usernames that failed lookup due to network/API errors

Both "users" and "notFoundUsernames" results can be cached safely.

get.summary: Get mutual vouchers for a viewer and target profile
Verify authentication for Ethos Everywhere wallet
get.description: Returns ok when authenticated. If the access token is expired, it will be refreshed using the refresh token.

get.summary: Check if wallet has enough funds for transactions
get.description: Returns whether the Ethos Everywhere wallet has sufficient balance for transactions like reviews, votes, or replies. Also indicates if gas sponsorship is available.

post.summary: Create a review via an Ethos Everywhere wallet
post.description: Signs and submits a review transaction using the user's Ethos Everywhere wallet. >  **Warning:** This is a beta endpoint. It is **not guaranteed to be stable** and may change or break without notice.

waitForTxTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds to wait for the transaction to be processed by Ethos. Defaults to 5 seconds. Set to 0 to skip waiting.

post.summary: Create a review by address via an Ethos Everywhere wallet
post.description: Signs and submits a review transaction for a subject address using the user's Ethos Everywhere wallet. >  **Warning:** This is a beta endpoint. It is **not guaranteed to be stable** and may change or break without notice.

waitForTxTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds to wait for the transaction to be processed by Ethos. Defaults to 5 seconds. Set to 0 to skip waiting.

post.summary: Create a review for x.com account via an Ethos Everywhere wallet
post.description: Signs and submits a review transaction for an x.com account (id or username) using the user's Ethos Everywhere wallet. >  **Warning:** This is a beta endpoint. It is **not guaranteed to be stable** and may change or break without notice.

waitForTxTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds to wait for the transaction to be processed by Ethos. Defaults to 5 seconds. Set to 0 to skip waiting.

post.summary: Vote on an activity via Ethos Everywhere wallet
post.description: Submits an upvote or downvote on a review, vouch, attestation, slash, broker post, project, reputation market, or reply using the user's Ethos Everywhere wallet. >  **Warning:** This is a beta endpoint. It is **not guaranteed to be stable** and may change or break without notice.

waitForTxTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds to wait for the transaction to be processed by Ethos. Defaults to 5 seconds. Set to 0 to skip waiting.

post.summary: Reply to an activity via Ethos Everywhere wallet
post.description: Posts a reply to a review, vouch, attestation, slash, broker post, project, reputation market, or existing reply (use activityType='reply') using the user's Ethos Everywhere wallet. >  **Warning:** This is a beta endpoint. It is **not guaranteed to be stable** and may change or break without notice.

waitForTxTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds to wait for the transaction to be processed by Ethos. Defaults to 5 seconds. Set to 0 to skip waiting.

post.summary: Archive a review via Ethos Everywhere wallet
post.description: Archives a review using the user's Ethos Everywhere wallet. >  **Warning:** This is a beta endpoint. It is **not guaranteed to be stable** and may change or break without notice.

waitForTxTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds to wait for the transaction to be processed by Ethos. Defaults to 5 seconds. Set to 0 to skip waiting.

post.summary: Invite an address via Ethos Everywhere wallet
post.description: Invites an address to Ethos using the user's Ethos Everywhere wallet. >  **Warning:** This is a beta endpoint. It is **not guaranteed to be stable** and may change or break without notice.

waitForTxTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds to wait for the transaction to be processed by Ethos. Defaults to 5 seconds. Set to 0 to skip waiting.

processed.description: Whether the invitation transaction has been received & processed by Ethos.

post.summary: Cancel an invite via Ethos Everywhere wallet
post.description: Cancels an invitation (uninvites a user) using the user's Ethos Everywhere wallet. >  **Warning:** This is a beta endpoint. It is **not guaranteed to be stable** and may change or break without notice.

waitForUninviteTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds to wait for the uninvite transaction to be processed by Ethos. Defaults to 5 seconds. Set to 0 to skip waiting.

processed.description: Whether the uninvite transaction has been received & processed by Ethos.

post.summary: Create a bond via Ethos Everywhere wallet
post.description: Creates a bond using the user's Ethos Everywhere wallet. The signature must be obtained from the signatures.createHumanityBond endpoint first. >  **Warning:** This is a beta endpoint. It is **not guaranteed to be stable** and may change or break without notice.

waitForTxTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds to wait for the transaction to be processed by Ethos. Defaults to 5 seconds. Set to 0 to skip waiting.

processed.description: Whether the bond transaction has been received & processed by Ethos.
